txt.en: Among the fallen Dunlendings, you found this spearhead. The similarity to this and those found in Br√¥ntrig is disconcerting.\n\nThe origin of these cruel barbs may lead to the identity of those who are supplying the Dunlendings. You should bring the spearhead to Garrun.

'In my many years of fighting, I have seen things such as these. This kind of weapon is far too cruel for any of the Dunlending peoples to forge. It resembles much more those wielded by Orcs and their kind.\n\n'How the Dunlendings obtained these weapons is mystery... one which we must uncover.'
You found a crude and unusually crafted spearhead among the belongings of the fallen Dunlendings.
Bring the cruel barb to Garrun in the Isendale
Garrun is at his camp, west of Cuvnerth.\n\nYou should bring the cruel barb to Garrun.
